remoteClasses.name: RecorderEndpoint
remoteClasses.doc: Provides function to store contents in reliable mode (doesn't discard data). It contains :rom:cls:`MediaSink` pads for audio and video.

params.name: mediaPipeline
params.doc: the :rom:cls:`MediaPipeline` to which the endpoint belongs

params.name: uri
params.doc: URI where the recording will be stored

params.name: mediaProfile
params.doc: Choose either a :rom:attr:`MediaProfileSpecType.WEBM`, a :rom:attr:`MediaProfileSpecType.MP4`, or a :rom:attr:`MediaProfileSpecType.JPEG` profile for recording

params.name: stopOnEndOfStream
params.doc: Forces the recorder endpoint to finish processing data when an :term:`EOS` is detected in the stream

methods.name: record
methods.doc: Starts storing media received through the :rom:cls:`MediaSink` pad
